parameters.name: IpamPoolId
parameters.description:
The instance ID of the IPAM pool.

> **IpamPoolId** cannot be the ID of a shared IPAM pool.

parameters.name: IpamScopeId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the IPAM scope.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used for the next query. Valid values:

- Do not specify this parameter for the first request.

- For subsequent queries, set this parameter to the NextToken value returned from the previous query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the IPAM is deployed.

Call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to get the region ID.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC to which the resource belongs.
